name: Oubliette (itch)
description:
Welcome to Oubliette, a sandbox style game where you create and play through your own puzzle-filled dungeon level.

Have fun designing your own dungeon level and fill it with traps including boulders, spikes, pendulums, pressure switches, levers, and moving tiles. Add enemy ghosts, spiders, and suits of armour to hunt your character in the darkness of the Oubliette.

Test out your creation, collect the emblem, and race to the exit elevator!
